p: We can tell from the results of the two periods that no staff or patient caught infection of COVID-19 during the epidemic, or no mortality of the two periods. With the help of the strict work flow and smart equipment, the rates of adverse outcomes including complications and re-operation had been reduced significantly compared to the former year ( p < 0.05), and patients who underwent surgery may have benefited from the work flow during the pandemic. However, duration, SSI, and system infection had no significant difference between the two periods ( p > 0.05).
